thread.title: Three schoolboys arrested after students hospitalised following horror ‘noxious substance’ attack at school
thread.title_full: Three schoolboys arrested after students hospitalised following horror ‘noxious substance’ attack at school

author: elake
title: Three schoolboys arrested after students hospitalised following horror ‘noxious substance’ attack at school
text:
Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments THREE schoolboys aged just 12, 13 and 15 have been arrested after a “noxious substance” was thrown during a reported brawl. 
The three suspects have been arrested on suspicion of GBH after a fight reportedly broke out between students at an east London school. Pupils were attacked with a substance, suspected to be acid, at Sydney Russell School, in Dagenham 
Emergency services were called to the school in Dagenham, just after 2pm on Wednesday. 
Six patients were treated by ambulance crews, three of which, two girls and a boy, were taken to hospital. 
Two of the three victims have since been discharged from hospital. related stories FIGHT FOR OUR FREE PRESS Don't let the Government and rich celebs deny YOU a Press free to expose wrongdoing 'MY FACE IS TRANSFORMED' Woman horrifically scarred when her jealous friend threw acid over her in her SLEEP has life-changing op - and has now got married ACID THUG APPEAL Acid attack brother who left woman partially blind and scarred for life has jail appeal thrown out 'Acid' spray charge Teen charged over three 'acid' attacks in city centre carried out in broad daylight CITY CENTRE ATTACK Boy, 17, arrested after four people injured in 'acid attacks' 
The schoolboys arrested remain in police custody. 
All those involved were pupils at the school. 
Anyone with information is asked to call 101.
